actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain interests of the United States retained in certain lands heretofore conveyed to the State of Texas shall be conveyed to such State.

summary.text: Provides that specified interests of the United States retained in specified lands heretofore conveyed to the State of Texas, and located in the vicinity of Fort Worth, Texas, shall be conveyed to such State.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain interests of the United States retained in certain lands heretofore conveyed to the State of Texas shall be conveyed to such State.
